description: Universal metadata schema for RL training data - works with any website

field_descriptions.domain: Domain name without www or protocols
field_descriptions.title: Page title from <title> tag
field_descriptions.og_type: Open Graph type (article, video, website, etc.)
field_descriptions.content_keywords: Array of significant words extracted from content (stemmed, lowercase)
field_descriptions.extracted_text: First 200-500 characters of visible text content
field_descriptions.content_length: Total character count of page content
field_descriptions.external_links_count: Number of links to external domains
field_descriptions.has_video: Boolean indicating presence of video elements
field_descriptions.has_forms: Boolean indicating presence of form elements
field_descriptions.label: Training label: 1 = allow, 0 = block
